scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:game
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:push: cd backend && DATABASE_URL="postgresql://fortezza:fortezza123@localhost:5432/fortezza?schema=public" npx prisma db push --skip-generate --accept-data-loss
scripts.docker:build-all: docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:push:frontend: docker build -t colechiodo/fortezza-frontend:latest ./frontend && docker push colechiodo/fortezza-frontend:latest
scripts.docker:push:backend: docker build -t colechiodo/fortezza-backend:latest ./backend && docker push colechiodo/fortezza-backend:latest
scripts.docker:push:game: docker build -t colechiodo/fortezza-game-server:latest ./game-server && docker push colechiodo/fortezza-game-server:latest
scripts.docker:push:all: npm run docker:push:frontend && npm run docker:push:backend && npm run docker:push:game
